Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class serves as the main entry point for the Home Appliance Store application. It provides a menu-driven interface to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on products and customers using DAOs (Data Access Objects). Features include: Listing all products and customers Searching for a product or customer by ID Adding new products or customers Updating product or customer details Deleting products or customers The program runs in a loop, displaying a menu to the user and handling input via the Scanner class.
Author:
dominic cash

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method that starts the Home Appliance Store application. It initializes DAOs for products and customers, creates a menu-driven interface, and routes user choices to the appropriate methods.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used)

    • listAllProducts

      public static void listAllProducts(HomeApplianceDAO applianceDAO)
      Displays all products available in the store by fetching them from the database.
      Parameters:
      applianceDAO - the DAO used to access product data

    • searchProductById

      public static void searchProductById(HomeApplianceDAO applianceDAO, Scanner in)
      Searches for a product in the store by its ID and displays the details if found.
      Parameters:
      applianceDAO - the DAO used to access product data
      in - the Scanner object used to read user input

    • addNewProduct

      public static void addNewProduct(HomeApplianceDAO applianceDAO, Scanner in)
      Adds a new product to the store by taking user input for its details.
      Parameters:
      applianceDAO - the DAO used to access and modify product data
      in - the Scanner object used to read user input

    • updateProductById

      public static void updateProductById(HomeApplianceDAO applianceDAO, Scanner in)
      Updates the details of an existing product in the store by its ID. The user can choose to update specific fields or keep existing values.
      Parameters:
      applianceDAO - the DAO used to access and modify product data
      in - the Scanner object used to read user input

    • deleteProductById

      public static void deleteProductById(HomeApplianceDAO applianceDAO, Scanner in)
      Deletes a product from the store by its ID after user confirmation.
      Parameters:
      applianceDAO - the DAO used to access and modify product data
      in - the Scanner object used to read user input
